item.title: StoryLINE – SpeedRun Challenge
item.dc:creator: Arkesh
item.description:
StoryLINE is a story-based platformer game. You have to draw lines and reach the end. Also, it has SpeedRun Mode. Take part in SpeedRun Challenge and Win up to Rs 50k. All the Best! #Proudly Made in India

The post StoryLINE – SpeedRun Challenge first appeared on Indian Developers.
item.content:encoded:
StoryLINE is a story-based platformer game.
You have to draw lines and reach the end.
Also, it has SpeedRun Mode.

Take part in SpeedRun Challenge and Win up to Rs 50k.
All the Best!
#Proudly Made in India

The post StoryLINE – SpeedRun Challenge first appeared on Indian Developers.

item.title: Dark-Horror Game
item.dc:creator: Arkesh
item.description:
A boy is trapped in a haunted mansion and you have to helped him to escape from the mansion. For escape , You have to collect items and solved the mystery to defeat enemy . All the Best! Note: It may lag in less than 4 GB ram. #Proudly Made in India

The post Dark-Horror Game first appeared on Indian Developers.
item.content:encoded:
A boy is trapped in a haunted mansion and
you have to helped him to escape from the mansion.
For escape , You have to collect items and solved the mystery to defeat enemy .

All the Best!

Note: It may lag in less than 4 GB ram.

#Proudly Made in India

The post Dark-Horror Game first appeared on Indian Developers.
